original_title: 餓狼伝説 15th Anniversary ～Memories of Stray Wolves～
overview: Memories of Stray Wolves is an animated featurette recapping the stories of Fatal Fury: King of Fighters, Fatal Fury 2, Fatal Fury 3: Road to the Final Victory, and Real Bout Fatal Fury. It was included on a bonus dvd for the Garou Densetsu 15th Anniversary Box.
title: Garou Densetsu 15th Anniversary ~Memories of Stray Wolves~
